summary: One day, when Sabah least expects it, she falls in love with the wrong man. She's Muslim, he's not. Unbeknownst to her family, she goes on a whirlwind affair before both culture and love collide.
cast: Arsinée Khanjian|Setta Keshishian|Roula Said|Fadia Nadda|Jeff Seymour|Kathryn Winslow|Shawn Doyle|Aaron Abrams|Mary Lou Fallis|David Alpay|Kaylen Christensen

title: Sabah
